OOC: No problem here. Maybe we could even connect it to the site, if we have the ability to do so. I'm not sure what things on the site we can and cant control.
 EmprzAnastazia@... wrote:Putting a dedication page up for Decepticon Fembots. For those of you who have Fembots that fight for the Decepticon cause, Email me with your character... & if you have a pic of them, send it too... as well as a profile or summary about them. 

This is in total dedication to Decepticon fembots... Send them in! Send them to me... either at EmprzAnastazia@...  or MaximaSR74@...

Thanx,
Stac
